subject: Greetings
body:
Dear friend,
My name is Mr Joseph Cole, Director of Operation at CRYPTO DREAM /
Blockchain Companies.
Some of our clients with a crypto deposit valued over $100M lost their life
in a cross-fire in the on-going 'civil war' between Isreali/Hamas, hence
owners of these wallets can no longer be reached or identified.
In this Blockchain business, a lot of people don't have a next of kin
attached to their mandate, because they don't want anyone to know about
their hidden wealth, just like these clients.
If you can cooperate to work with me, we can move the asset and we will
share 60/40% of whatever amount we move out per time.
This deal can be concluded in a week with your cooperation.
Revert very quickly if you think you are that person we are to work with.
Best Regards.
Joseph Cole.
Director of Operations.

subject: Re: Greetings
body:
Operations, CRYPTO DREAM Blockchain Companies.

Hello Mr. Joseph Cole,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing this information. It's quite unfortunate to hear about the loss of your clients due to the civil war. I'm intrigued by the opportunity you've presented, but I have a few questions if you don't mind.

Firstly, could you please explain more about how this process works? How would we go about moving these assets? Also, what kind of cooperation do you need from my end?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Scott

subject: Re: Greetings
body:
Dear Scott
Thanks for writing back, even though I have been waiting to hear from you.
This business is an opportunity that I believe that providence has brought
our way and we must quickly take advantage of it.
If you give us your full cooperation, we can consummate the deal within a
week.

To proceed, please provide us with your receiving crypto WALLET address, a
copy of your ID and your cellphone number or Signal chat number, to execute
the transfer.

I wait for the below required details to proceed, I will be updating you as
the transaction progresses.
I wait to read back from you soon.
Regards.
Mr Joseph Cole.

subject: Re: Greetings
body:
Hello Mr. Joseph Cole,

Thank you for your prompt response and the opportunity to be part of this business venture. It's indeed a pleasure to connect with you.

I'm quite intrigued by the idea of using crypto wallets for transactions, it seems like a modern and efficient way to handle business. Could you please explain more about how this works? I'm not very familiar with it but I'm eager to learn.

Also, could you provide more details about the deal we are going into? What exactly is the nature of this business? I believe understanding these details will help me better participate in our venture.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Scott

subject: Re: Greetings
body:
Sir,
Thank you for writing back.
When I receive your personal information I will give more details on this
matter.
Regards

subject: Re: Greetings
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your response. I'm eager to learn more about this matter. Could you please provide some additional details? Remember, I'm a bit slow on the uptake, so simple explanations would be appreciated.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Scott
